title: Horroriffic Monster from Space! The Hideous Sun Demon 1958 | Full Sci-Fi Movie

sources.title: Horroriffic Monster from Space! The Hideous Sun Demon 1958 | Full Sci-Fi Movie
sources.description:
By day, a brilliant scientist... by sunset, a scaly nightmare! Can he beat the clock before the next sunrise?
After a lab accident bathes him in radiation, Dr. Gilbert McKenna discovers sunlight triggers a terrifying transformation. Now he's racing against dusk to find a cure while evading those who see his condition as a threat.

Original Title: The Hideous Sun Demon (1958) | AKA: Saurus

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/3Q0IX8K-v5k

00:00 Full movie (with subtitles)
02:35 Dr. Gilbert McKenna is admitted to the hospital after being exposed to a new radiation hazard from the sun.
06:08 Dr. McKenna is experiencing a strange medical phenomenon related to the evolutionary process of life.
12:49 Scientists confirm McKenna's condition causes prehistoric regression when sun-exposed.
28:05 McKenna meets Trudy at a bar, seeking nocturnal companionship to evade his curse.
38:33 Ann reveals a potential cure exists, giving McKenna renewed hope for reversal.
42:14 Daylight exposure forces McKenna into hiding after a public metamorphosis.
52:01 McKenna flees police after a fatal encounter, triggering a citywide manhunt.
1:03:37 A child discovers McKenna's hideout, forcing his final confrontation with authorities.
